card_name: Noire, Wrong Side of the Bow
rules_text:
Deathtouch, reach, trample
[i]Before the Storm[/i] – At the end of your first post combat main phase, you gain an additional combat phase. Untap each creature you control that attacked this turn.
[i]Prescience[/i] – Whenever Noire, Wrong Side of the Bow attacks, put a menace counter onto target creature you control.
[i]Inner Demon[/i] – Creatures you control with menace can't be blocked by more than two creatures.
